ai-patthana16.86:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma
ai-patthana16.86:0.3_0: Seeing what is conceived in happiness,
ai-patthana16.86:1.1_0: One who has not got the flood that gives rise to bliss, and doesn’t give rise to bliss for the sake of non-existence.
ai-patthana16.86:2.1_0: One does not give rise to the pleasure of pain, etc., nor does repulsion come to an end.
ai-patthana16.86:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
